title: Capitalism 4.0: The Birth of a New Economy in the Aftermath of Crisis
description: In early 2009, many economists, financiers, and media pundits were confidently predicting the end of the American-led capitalism that has shaped history and economics for the past 100 years. Yet the U.S. economic model, far from being discredited, may be strengthened by the financial crisis.
author: Anatole Kaletsky
